net.sf.jIPtables.log
Class LogTracker

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jIPtables.log.LogTracker

public class LogTracker
extends java.lang.Object

Listen on iptables log provided by netfilter. The type of log notified depends on the NFLOG target rule specified in the iptables configuration.

Method Summary

          Add a log listener that will be notified when a firewall log is notified

Method Detail

getInstance

public static LogTracker getInstance()
Get a log tracker, the netfilter group is set to the default group 0. All logs will be notified in cronological order.

getInstance

public static LogTracker getInstance(int nfGroup)
Get a log tracker that listen on the specified netfilter group. All logs will be notified in cronological order.

Parameters:
nfGroup - The netfilter group

getNFGroup

public int getNFGroup()
Returns:
The Netfilter group this log tracker is associated with

addLogListener

public void addLogListener(LogListener l)
Add a log listener that will be notified when a firewall log is notified

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If the specified listener is null

removeLogListener

public void removeLogListener(LogListener l)
Remove a log listener

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If the specified listener is null
